item.title: Some fun with Python and R Code!
item.description: Python The following is an example of slicing. x=['p', 'y', 't', 'h', 'o', 'n'] x[2:4] #elements between slices 2 and 3 (or elements from position 2 up to but not including 4) ## ['t', 'h'] The following is an example of using re.findall() to match the IP addresses in this string. import re string="Jan 13 00:48:59: DROP service 68->67(udp) from 213.92.153.167 to 69.43.107.219, prefix: \"spoof iana-0/8\" \ (in: eth0 69.
